About us

Meet the team

Find out more about the team at Go Beyond Holidays…

Hover over the team member's profile to visit their page

Ian Callen

Ian is the founder and one of the directors of Go Beyond.

Anna Callen

Anna is one of the directors of Go Beyond and oversees the administrative side of the holidays.

Karen Galway

Hi, my name is Karen Galway and I was born in Leicester, before moving to beautiful Cornwall in 1982.

Kevin Bunch

Kevin is the newest member of our team and we’re so delighted to have him on board.

Su Porter

Su Holborn lives in Devon sandwiched between the open vistas of Dartmoor and the stunning South Devon coast, both of these being visited regularly for work and play.

John Ryde

John Ryde has been married for over 40 years and lives in rural Dorset.

Helen Johnstone

Helen, our chef, will take your taste buds beyond!

Laura Allen

Laura originally trained as a nursery nurse working in schools, before transferring her skills to community engagement work and enabling support work.

Joseph Callen

Joseph has grown up with Go Beyond Holidays. He was there from the start, being the eldest child of Directors Ian and Anna.

Jasmine Callen

Jasmine has grown up with Go Beyond Holidays. She was there at the beginning, being Director’s Ian and Anna’s daughter, as a cheerful 4 year old, with lots of smiles for our guests.

Chris Little

Chris is an experienced teacher with a passion for outdoor learning and inclusive adventure. He lives in Cornwall, loves sailing and walking with his mischievous young collie, Gwen.

Richard Thompson

Richard’s vision, knowledge, passion and commitment for making travel accessible and inclusive, everywhere, to everyone, is world renowned. His unique capacity to educate and enlighten sought around the globe.
